description.narrative: Project name: Strengthening and Empowering Political Institution Problem analysis: The targeted ethnic parties are limited participation of ethnic minorities in the democratization process.  The participation of ethnic youth and women are also limited to decision-making because their capability is underestimated, and they have no/or few opportunities to build their capacity.  The general public are not aware of and interested in the political affair.  Collaboration and coordination of the political institutions are weak due to not having a platform, organizers and funding for them.  The project aims to promote political representation and participation by strengthening the institutional and individual capacity of the political parties’ especially ethnic parties in Kayah and Southern Shan State and raising socio-political awareness of the general public. The project will conduct regular stakeholder consultation, baseline survey, curriculum development, capacity building training for party members, grant to the alumni for multiplier trainings, women leadership training (WLT) and do research by WLT alumni.  In addition, advocacy action at local and regional level will be conducted based on the research finding from WLT alumni.  The main results are: *   Institutional capacities of ethnic parties is strengthened *   Potential party leaders equipped with skills and knowledge of politics *  General public are aware of socio-politics and participatory process at the local and national levels *   Empowered women party members can show their worthiness for the better role and achieve a place what they deserve. *  Well-functioning network platforms among political parties and between parties and CSOs are built *   Accountability and quality management system are well functioning The thematic areas of the project are democracy and rights.
This project mainly contributes to results within Fulfilment of women's rights. Results will be reported later in the Global Civsam grant period 2016-2020

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
